sentences.english: Exclusive distribution of "HIESTAND Swiss Gourmet Bakery" leader in frozen premium good.

sentences.english: With continuous innovation, and gradually developed into a leading enterprise in the industry.

sentences.english: TRS Group Co. , Ltd is among the first batch of Leading National Agricultural Enterprises.

sentences.english: We are the market leader in self-cater package to Spain.

sentences.english: Be chosen as advanced agriculture leading enterprises by Jining in 2003.
